name: transitionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves a change, or the process of change, from one situation or state to another: The centre provides help for transitionally homeless women. A narrow band of trees grows transitionally between the pines and the lower vegetation.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was an important artist to me transitionally as I moved from adolescence to maturity.There are several times in my life when I have lived, at least transitionally, as part of a multi-generational family.This solution could work transitionally until the housing situation improves.
